description: Yay! Its the first day of December! Wether you celebrate Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanzaa, or just the winter itself. We here at the advent calendar wish you a happy December!
Today is Pop Star's Britney Spears Birthday!
Today is Let's Hug Day, so go give someone a hug today!
Today is Santa's List Day!
Today is Walt Disney's Birthday!, thanks for giving us Mickey Mouse!
Today is Saint Nicholas Day (Western)!
Today is National Cotton Candy Day!
Today is National Christmas Tree Day in the United States!
Today A Charlie Brown Christmas was released in 1965!
Today the first Lord of the Rings film was released in 2001
Today is National Have a Bagel Day! So go have a bagel, my personal favorite is Everything Bagel
Today is Frank Sinatra's Birthday, today he would have been 110 years old
Today is Pop Star's Taylor Swift Birthday!
In the year 2025 today is the first night of Hanukkah!
Today is National Cupcake Day! And happy 2nd night of Hanukkah!
Today in 1773 the Boston Tea Party happened, a very important day in American History! And Happy 3rd night of Hanukkah!

Today in 1989 The Simpsons debuted as a full series in the U.S., transitioning from its earlier animated shorts on The Tracey Ullman Show. Who is your favorite Simpsons character? My personal favorite is Moe. And Happy 4th night of Hanukkah!
Today in 1787, New Jersey becomes the third state to ratify the U.S. Constitution. Happy 5th night of Hanukkah!
Today in 1843, Charles Dickens A Christmas Carol was first published. Happy 6th night of Hanukkah!
In 1946 the famous holiday movie It's a Wonderful Life premiers!. Happy 7th night of Hanukkah!
Today is Crossword Puzzle Day!. Happy last night of Hanukkah!
Today is Nut Bread Day!
Today is actor / comedian Harry Shearer's Birthday, you might know him from Spinal Tap or as multiple voices on The Simpsons
Happy Christmas Eve!
Merry Christmas!
Today is the start of Kwanzaa!
Today in 1932 Radio City Music Hall opened in New York City. Happy 2nd day of Kwanzaa!
Today is National Call a Friend Day! Happy 3rd day of Kwanzaa!
Today in 1845 Texas officially became a state. Happy 4th day of Kwanzaa!
Happy New Year's Eve and Happy 5th day of Kwanzaa!
Happy 6th day of Kwanzaa! And Happy New Year's Eve! We hope you had a happy 2025 and wish you a great 2026!
